title: Redeploy Brilliant Coaching Centre to Production

requirements.summary: Deploy the current version of the application to production on the Internet Computer without introducing new features or changes
acceptanceCriteria: The application is successfully deployed and accessible at its production canister URL.
All existing features (Hero, About, Courses, Gallery, Teachers, WhyChooseUs, Contact, Footer, etc.) are functional in the live environment.
The TeachersNotes component remains removed from the live build.

file_operations.description: Remove the empty TeachersNotes component file to ensure it is not included in the production build and confirm it remains absent from the deployed application.
Verify that TeachersNotes is not imported or rendered anywhere in the root App component, ensuring the production build excludes this component entirely.
Ensure the HTML shell is production-ready with correct meta tags and title for deployment to the live Internet Computer environment.
Verify the app entry point is correctly configured for production deployment with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider properly wired for the live canister environment.
